message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $115. I think it's a fair price considering its value.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I would like to counteroffer at $100.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm looking for something a bit closer to my initial price. Would you consider $110?
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I am willing to go up to $105.
